vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2559 for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a private-club bar and a commercial amusement (inside), limited to a dance hall on property zoned a CS Commercial Service District, on the west line of McCree Road, north of East Northwest Highway
Recommendation of Staff:   Approval, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to amended conditions
Z245-135(LC)
